name: Elite Forces: Unit 77
description:
A series of mysterious disappearances of high profile personalities from the world of science, industry and entertainment is soon revealed as a horrific global terrorist threat. With the clock running and the lives of the hostages and millions of others in danger, the international community‘s last hope lies with an extremely covert and highly specialized military team: Unit 77. Made up of four professionals who are the best in the world at what they do, Unit 77 must combine their skills to stop massive world destruction by the hands of terrorists
Features:


• An intense combination of action, military strategy and tactical gameplay

• Control four specialized characters: the quiet and effective sniper, the fearless explosives expert, the brilliant hacker and the devastatingly powerful gunner.

• Control a single character or the whole team for a greater tactical experience

• High detailed 3D environments that move the action from the dense jungles of the tropics to abandoned arctic and the sweltering sands of the desert.

• Various actions: disarm mines, drive vehicles, access encrypted files or use stealth
